tool_description: The India Today Unofficial API is a third-party web service that provides access to news content from the India Today platform. It allows developers to retrieve articles, videos, images, and other information related to various topics. Please note that it is not an official API provided by India Today.
name: India Today Unofficial
title: India Today Unofficial

api_list.name: Tag Search
api_list.description: Get news as per the tag
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://india-today-unofficial.p.rapidapi.com/news/India"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "india-today-unofficial.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://india-today-unofficial.p.rapidapi.com/news/{tag}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "india-today-unofficial.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
